description.value: Whenever Hespotherad scores a critical hit with a psychic power, he regains a spent action point.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ poison, psychic, weapon

Standard

Attack: Melee 1 (one creature)

+29 vs. AC

Hit: 2d8 + 10 poison and psychic damage.

At-Will ✦ poison, psychic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 20 (one or two enemies)

+27 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4d8 + 14 poison and psychic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of Hespotherad's next turn.

Encounter ✦ poison, psychic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 20 (one creature)

+27 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4d6 + 18 poison and psychic damage.

Effect: Hespotherad makes a secondary attack using the primary target's square as the origin square.

Secondary Attack: Close burst 5 (one or two creatures other than the primary target); +27 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4d6 + 18 poison and psychic damage.

At-Will ✦ psychic

Standard

Attack: Close blast 3 (creatures in the blast)

+27 vs. Will

Hit: 5d10 + 20 psychic damage, and Hespotherad pushes the target 2 squares.

Encounter ✦ poison

Standard

Attack: Area burst 2 within 20 (creatures in the burst)

+27 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 8d6 + 14 poison damage, and the target gains vulnerable 15 poison (save ends).

Encounter ✦ teleportation

Move

Effect: Hespotherad teleports 10 squares. Any creature adjacent to him at the start of this move is dazed until the end of Hespotherad's next turn.

Recharge 4, or 3 while bloodied ✦ gaze, poison, psychic

Minor

Attack: Close blast 5 (creatures in the blast)

+27 vs. Will

Hit: 2d8 + 14 poison and psychic damage, and the target is dazed and weakened until the end of Hespotherad's next turn.

Recharge 5-6

Minor

Effect: Hespotherad regains the use of an expended encounter power.

system.biography:
HP 872; Bloodied 436
Resist 20 poison, 15 psychic 		Init +21 | AP 2 | Save +5 (+10 against charm effects)
AC 38Fort 34Ref 37Will 36
Speed 6 (8 when bloodied)
Ability ScoresStr 12 (+13)
Con 18 (+16)		Dex 28 (+21)
Int 15 (+14)		Wis 15 (+14)
Cha 24 (+19)
Languages Common, Elven
Alignment Evil
Skills Acrobatics +26, Arcana +19, Bluff +23, Insight +19, Intimidate +23, Nature +19Senses
Passive Perception 24 | Insight 29

Equipment longsword .

Traits
